Technique: ENGOBE; ENGRAVED; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Jar
Description: Jar with narrow mouth and neck, bitruncate cone-shaped body and stable base with very high ring-shaped foot. It has a ribbon handle starting at the rim and ending at the shoulders. Paste of a pink colour. Exterior surface with reddish coating, partially lost.  The body shows an incised decoration of parallel lines encircling the piece. On the shoulders, an incised decoration of lines and rectangular and curved strokes.
